original: 啟稟大人，<color=#fff999>$leader1</color>竟敢拒絕本姑娘的招募，來日定要教訓一番，使其下跪求饒！(<color=#bceea7>招募失敗</color>)
text: Master, <color=#fff999>$leader1</color> dare to refuse the recruitment of this girl, and I will teach you a lesson in the future and make him kneel and beg for mercy! (<color=#bceea7>Recruitment failed</color>)
